title: DYSTOPIAN FUTURE MUSIC by serot.one
description: 10 LOOPABLE tracks that will add a dystopian future vibe to your game.
longDescription:
Preview: SoundCloud


10 LOOPABLE tracks that will add a dystopian future vibe to your game.


Professionally mixed and mastered at an industry standard -14 LUFS.


We created a variety of tracks for different scenarios that can loop seamlessly.


Every imported Sound Wave file has a referenced Sound Cue file.


Import these songs into your project to get started.


Enjoy and thank you for supporting our hard work!


-serot.one
